description: You're in a long, empty hallway; not much going on here. There's an archway at the far end; it looks foggy? Shouldn't be foggy inside. That's weird.

south.input: Another lovely stone wall. Nothing out of the ordinary here... unless you're interested in the deep scratches in the stone that spell out "Beware the Eternal Fog" and ooze what I sure hope is water. Eerie. Not sure if you should go back to the previous room or continue on.
